*Infectra's optics open and see's a bunch of blurs till she focuses but was=
 still dizzy* Infectra:....woooooat happened?....oh yeah...I thunk soooo...=
. *Infectra starts to stand up till she's fully standing* Infectra: I think=
 that we should see what that we eaten!.... *Infectra says cheerfully befor=
e falling back to the ground and than her optics widen* Infectra: I have a.=
...head ache.....and a stomich ache....
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  F=
rom: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 11:42=
 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  Airbomber walked to Infectra and coll=
apsed near her face down. Stranato finally caught up to Arrow and grabbed h=
im. Both of them passed out as well. Blender and Stroghold looked at each o=
ther and then shrugged again. They collapsed as well. Train Wreck collapsed=
. Later, Airbomber wakes up. He walks a step and kneels down, he throws up =
and stands back up again before falling oveer again, the world was spinning=
. Stranato came back holding a sleeping Arrow by his arm.

  "Youuuu ookayy=
eeee?" Stranato asked.

  "I thank sue." Airbomber replied. Stranato droppe=
d Arrow and fell. He laughed and groaned. Airbomber looked back to Infectra=
 to see if she was alright...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: i=
lovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000=
 6:47 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    *Infectra jumps up running b=
ehind a bush spitting the mixture out* Infectra:....oohhh..... *Infectra mo=
ans because she was now getting a stomich ache* *Infectra walks back out an=
d falls on her back*
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECOD=
E 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:37 PM
=
      Subject: Neo Beast Wars


      Plintissa walked around the desert, n=
ight was falling (Is it okay for night to fall in Plintissa's area?) and sh=
e didn't believe her luck. Her scanner was broken, Artist's scanner was bro=
ken or he was too stupid to use it, probably the latter, and she was hungry=
, there wasn't anything but sand out here. Now that the sun was going down,=
 it started to cool down and Plintissa was calmed. Plintissa walked on, thi=
nking about how miserable life had been to her, and that it only intended t=
o get worse, why did she come to this planet anyway? Why did she leave Cybe=
rtron? She remembered that she did indeed have ONE friend on Cybertron, a f=
riend that loved her with all heart, only problem was, Plintissa didn't lov=
e this friend back, because the friend was a fembot. Plintissa's old friend=
 was eventually killed by some bots in the shadows, never did catch those c=
reeps neither. She later learned that the murderers were a couple that had =
killed millions, but somehow always illuded the cops. Stupid police, never =
good enough when you need them to be REALLY good, maybe she was expecting t=
oo much. Plintissa seen something but assumed it was a mirage, she assumed =
right...

      Artist walked along the desert, tapping his scanner, it was=
 broken. Either Plintissa's scanner was broken or she was too stupid to use=
 it, probably the latter, he couldn't believe his luck! Artist walked throu=
gh the desert, thinking about how boring his life was, he walked through th=
e desest, he served crippled bots, he hung around, he did good things and n=
ever was even noticed, he was tired of it all! The Maximals needed a hero, =
he brung it to them, they never payed him any mind! Artist held his head in=
 rage, his headache swelling, he snarled a snarl not normally done by wovle=
s. He transformed to Beast mode and ran across the desert, howling and reme=
mbering. He impaled Plintissa on a broken off autogun, he impaled Sinesis t=
he same way, Plintissa blew him to pieces? He screamed in arge and passed o=
ut...

      Dracona walked around the corner, she wouldn't miss the chance=
 to screw something up in the Pred base since nobody seemed to be there! Dr=
acona slowly made for the entrance...

      Gangon's spark started going d=
im and started to fade, seeing as how it has been seperated from it's body =
for so long...

      Sinesis woke up from Stasis lock and pulled away from=
 Blizzard, in extreme pain, he pulled past Quickstrike andf threw Sinister'=
s parts into a CR Tank. Then falling in himself, going into stasis lock. (O=
rchid is unable to reply at the moment, so I went ahead and took my charact=
ers to the CR Chamber, don't want them dead.)

      The Radicons went on e=
ating the stuff and Train Wreck took the time to examine it.

      "This w=
as made with poisonous verries and poisonous mushrooms." Train Wreck said. =
Stranato looked at Arrow with a "Going to kill" look and stood up. He waved=
 for Arrow to come. Arrow started to walk away. Stranato followed him. Arro=
w ran! Stranato chased him. Blender and Stronghold shrugged and drank beer.=


      "That was still good eating." Stronghold said.

      "I don't feel=
 too well." Airbomber said. Stronghold and Blender laughed. Train Wreck rol=
led his eyes and examined the other stuff in the weirf food made by Arrow. =
Squirrel meat? Weird...

      Deemos walked right up to the Maximal base, =
hoping the autoguns wouldn't fire, and headed toward the entrance...
